Description

Rightfully, Beary Arms is an interstellar; planning; shoot'em up roguelite. Take control of Beary Arms, a space bear, and his comical arsenal of weapons to eliminate his enemies. Plan his route carefully and manage his inventory to get Beary out alive. But bearware, even the smallest of missteps can lead to Beary's grizzly demise.

History

Features

  • Randomly generated ability trees
  • 23 unique upgrade abilties
  • Randomly generated dungeons and worlds
  • 12 weapons and counting (as of alpha, lots more incoming)
  • Randomly generate ability trees
  • Everytime Beary dies, pick a calamity which buffs the enemies.
  • 28 enemies and counting (as of alpha, lots more incoming)
